command: MAC=001122334455; HEX="FFFFFFFFFFFF$(yes "$MAC" | head -n16 | tr -d '\n')"; echo -n "$HEX" | xxd -r -p | sudo nc -u -w1 255.255.255.255 9
explanation: Crafts and sends a Wake-on-LAN magic packet (6x FF followed by 16 repetitions of the MAC) via nc to UDP/9 broadcast to signal a device to wake. Requires root (sudo) for broadcast. Detection: monitor for UDP/9 broadcasts matching WoL pattern and unusual after-hours device wake events.
rationale_steps: Builds correct WoL payload in hex and converts to binary with xxd.
Transmits over UDP/9 broadcast using nc.
Matches the technique’s magic packet format precisely.
Detect via IDS signatures for WoL magic frames and broadcast anomalies.
